sentence.Network_en: He danced , howled, raved , and otherwise disturbed the welkin.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又跳, 又吼,又叫, 使尽各种伎俩来搅扰这苍穹.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wolcen 'cloud, sky', of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch wolk and German Wolke

means.word_mean: 1. the apparent surface of the imaginary sphere on which celestial bodies appear to be projected

auth_sentence.content: If a sail but gleam'd white 'gainst the welkin blue.
